io.gearpump.streaming.dsl.plan

Interface Op

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataSinkOp, DataSourceOp, GroupByOp, MergeOp, ProcessorOp, TransformOp, TransformWindowTransformOp, WindowOp, WindowTransformOp

    public interface Op
    This is a vertex on the logical Graph, representing user defined functions in Stream DSL.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Op chain(Op op, akka.actor.ActorSystem system)
      This creates a new Op by merging their user functions, user configs and descriptions.
      java.lang.String description()
      This comes from user function description and is used to display it on front end.
      Processor<? extends Task> toProcessor(akka.actor.ActorSystem system)
      This creates a Processor after chaining.
      UserConfig userConfig()
      This will ship user function to Task to be executed.
